content: before going to the renaissance festival this year i was thinking of things that i could make and give away to random patrons at the festival i wanted something that didn t take a lot of yarn and something that would work up fast potion bottles came to mind so i just freehanded five different shapes they went over well and i actually gave away every single one that i made afterwards i decided that i would make some more and write down the patterns as i went this download includes all five different bottle shapes that i created materials 4mm hook worsted or dk yarn - 4 colors needed - potion color your choice bottle color i used white cork color i used a metallic goldish color yarn tan or brown will also work and chain color i used gold #10 thread but regular yarn will work as well scissors stitch marker & yarn needle terms used single_crochet - single_crochet magic_ring - magic_ring increase - increase fo - fasten_off decrease - decrease flo - front loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain st - stitch i just realized that round 18 of bottle #5 beaker is missing the decrease it should read 18 single_crochet x2 decrease around 18
